title: Documentation - View NAT settings
abstract:
# Documentation - View NAT settings
Google Distributed Cloud Hosted (GDCH) provides egress network address translation (NAT) to both virtual machine and containerized workloads when accessing external networks. The GDCH console shows all NAT settings across container deployments for a particular project.
To view NAT settings in the GDCH console, follow these steps:
- Sign in to the GDCH console.
- Click **Menu** .
- In the Networking section, click **NAT** .
- Use the project drop-down menu to select a project.
- All NAT settings across container deployments are shown for the selected project
